content:
<rule id="embedded-framework-02000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <file filename="spring-batch{*}.jar"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <iteration>
                    <when>
                        <not>
                            <file filename="spring-batch{*}test{*}.jar"/>
                        </not>
                    </when>
                    <perform>
                        <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Spring Batch">
                            <description>The application embeds the Spring Batch framework.</description>
                        </classification>
                        <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Spring Batch</technology-tag>
                    </perform>
                </iteration>
            </perform>
        </rule>
